title: We will stop freaking out about AI
description: One job of a journalist is to spot the problem. In 2025, we spotted plenty of issues related to AI. But those who say LLMs are killing our traffic are focused on the wrong problem. At the nonprofit Salt Lake Tribune, visits to sltrib.com are up more than 20% year over year. Search has grown...
